attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned urge the government to consider disolving the United Kingdom and be recognised as an independant soverign country. It has become clear due to recent discussion from Scotland and Wales of independance, that we are no longer acting as a Unified state any more and that the time has come, to part company with Scotland, Wales and N. Ireland. We uge the government to discuss disolving the Act of Union 1707 and declare England as an independant country.
